api_list.name: job stories
api_list.description: Up to 200 of the latest Job HN Stories!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yc-hacker-news-official.p.rapidapi.com/jobstories.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yc-hacker-news-official.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: item by id
api_list.description: Stories, comments, jobs, Ask HNs and even polls are just items. They're identified by their ids, which are unique integers.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yc-hacker-news-official.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
